Reviews.Title: LILIN LHS-DVR204-500GB 4 Channel Standalone Digital Video Recorder
Reviews.Author: Ramazi
Reviews.Content: Build quality and design of a good DVR. Unfortunately record at D1 resolution is not real time. Recently, I bought a cheap Chinese DVR, which in function and quality of this recording is much better.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 Advance Video Compression Technology. Full D1 H.264 D120fps/R120: 120pps.
Mobile Remote Monitoring- iPhone, 3G, PDA, Mobile Windows 5, 6 Compatible.
User Friendly Graphic User Interface. USB2.0 Flash Drive file backup (Flash-Disk not Included).
Network Audio, Voice and Live Monitoring.
Multiple Web Browsers support- IE, FireFox, Chrome, Safari etc..
ProductInfo.Name: LILIN LHS-DVR204-500GB 4 Channel Standalone Digital Video Recorder with Network Capability H.264 and 500 GB Hard Drive
